TopicTitle: New to the Forums, Not to the Game

Articles.Content:
Well first, hello! I've been playing the game for a while and stalking following you all on the forums, but I have hesitated to create an account until now.

Also, if anyone could help me with this: How can I change my signature? I've checked everywhere on my profile settings page, but found nothing. I even search "signature" (with CTRL + F) and found nothing. So if anyone could help me, I'd be grateful.

-Clever quote for signature goes here.

You need to post 3 more times, and then the forum software will agree to believe you are not a spambot, and grant you permission to do some personalization. Until then, I think the buttons are not even displayed for you.

Yeah, I realized this soon after I posted this thread, thanks though.

-Clever quote for signature goes here.
